attributes.action: Shift the revenue from vehicle licenses onto fuel to prevent license evasion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current rates of license evasion cause a massive hole in revenue. If fuel had an element to cover road licenses then those who rack up miles and use the roads most would pay the most. The elderly and those low milage users would therefore pay an appropriate amount also.

Bottom line though, nobody could evade paying to use the roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
